descriptionHtml:
Hey my second weapon its not perfect but i like it =) hope u guys do too 

smithable
upgradeable

deadric smithing is required

1 version with lower res edge but original
1 version with my own hig res metal/rusti edge

both in 1 hand and 2 hand version

i got the textures by my girlfrend =)


Clouds Claymore: my first weapon:
